title: Updated, 3 bedroom, 2 bath home
posting_body: Beautiful one story home, updated, 3 bedroom, 2 bath, with crown molding rear entry 2 car garage, great location, easy access to shopping in the highly sought neighborhood of Camelot, Richardson ISD, freshly painted, both bathrooms recently updated, large fence with mature trees, windows replaced smooth surface cooking with new microwave.
